name: No Eternity (Alternate Mix)
lyrics:
[Intro]
Time is under your spell
Infinite, until it breaks!
Rip my heart into shreds
And burn the pieces
Jealousy, endlessly
Mind of body taken places
[Verse 1]
Boundaries broken by lies of greats
When a cynical mind has no will to wait
I don't have a call to make to beings afar
'Cause when the sky's all black, there's only one North Star!
[Verse 2]
And so the tale's overtaken by the greed and the lust
At least that's what the book says, so take it how you think you must
It's all a fairy tale of love and joy until you're the troll
There's not a single thing I wish for, I have all that I told
[Verse 3]
I don't care to ponder it
I know gods are full of shit
Light they plead is shown in vain
'Cause they don't laugh when they feel pain
